title: 3wplayer and domplayer file decoders 3wdecoder
description:
This app will decode any file that has been uploaded by an asshole that when downloaded directs you to domplayer or 3wplayer or some other bullshit site to download their player in order to view the downloaded file (usually a movie/tv show).

It is unfortunate that scumbags like those exists hurting the whole torrent experience but at least we can share fixes that will circumvent their malware intentions.  Do not ever download domplayer or any other player you have never heard of as the chances are high it is a virus, spyware or malware application.

Good luck, and happy viewing.

PS.  This app fixes the bad header that has been applied to the video files. (this is why VLC, mplayer classic etc... will not work).

Sincerely

Mandrake
(Canada)
